text: “ ‘Ka ruodh pinyno kelo chiwo mar hera ni Jehova Nyasaye, obed misango miwangʼo pep kata chiwo mar lalruok, to nyaka yawne rangach mochomo yo wuok chiengʼ. Enochiw misangone miwangʼo pepno kata chiwo mage mag lalruok mana kaka ojatimo chiengʼ Sabato. Eka enowuog odhi oko, kendo kosewuok odhi oko, to nolor rangach.
